data.news_body:

1. Unaudited (Consolidated & Standalone) Financial Results for the Quarter ended 30th June 2025 and Limited Review Report.

2. Issue of bonus equity shares in the ratio of 1:1

7. Decided the Book Closure dates from 05th September 2025 to 11th September 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of the AGM and payment of dividend.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On May 28, 2021
data.news_body:

1. Approved Audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results for the Quarter and Year ended 31st March, 2021.
